ctu_text:
**NOTE:** Only one application under each component will be considered, however, the applicant may apply for more than one activity in a single application as per the eligibility.
**Application Fee** All the applications shall be accompanied by a non-refundable application fee of ₹ 100/- (Rupees one hundred only) + GST (Exempted for SC, ST, female and differently-abled persons). No application will be accepted without payment of application fees except for exempted stakeholders.
